directions.dialogText: Use functions to guide the squirrel up the tree and get the acorn.

levels.mission: By calling functions in the code panel above, move the squirrel up the tree to the acorn.
levels.tools:
```right()```- face right```left()```- face left   ```up()```- face up    ```down()```- face down

```move()```- move forward one square
levels.tips: The squirrel can move up the middle of the tree or along either side, and it can only move on top of branches.

directions.dialogText: Now use functions to gather all the acorns.

levels.mission: By calling functions in the code panel above, move the squirrel up the tree to the acorn.
levels.tools: right()- face right left()- face left up()- face up  down()- face down  move()- move forward one square
levels.tips: The squirrel can move up the middle of the tree or along either side, and it can only move on top of branches.
